pageRoute.$comment: Leave undefined to include all pages.

enTextOrLocalizationPath.$comment: English text or key into localization jsons.

enTextOrLocalizationKey.$comment: English text or key into localization jsons.

isExternal.$comment: External to Osmosis. Show disclaimer before linking out of app.

isWarning.$comment: Use orange styling, persist on page reloads.

persistent.$comment: Will always show on page reload. Use with caution. (Warnings persist)

startDate.$comment: ISO 8601 date-time string. Banner will not show until this date.

endDate.$comment: ISO 8601 date-time string. Banner will not show after this date.
